inputs.name: ofParticipant
inputs.description: Address requesting to redeem from a Melon fund

inputs.name: shareQuantity
inputs.description: Quantity of shares times 10 ** 18 offered to redeem

inputs.name: receiveQuantity
inputs.description: Quantity of Melon token times 10 ** 18 requested to receive for shareQuantity

abiDocs.name: isRedemptionPermitted
abiDocs.return: Whether identity is eligible to redeem from a Melon fund.
abiDocs.notice: Checks whether redemption is permitted for a participant

inputs.name: ofParticipant
inputs.description: Address requesting to invest in a Melon fund

inputs.name: giveQuantity
inputs.description: Quantity of Melon token times 10 ** 18 offered to receive shareQuantity

inputs.name: shareQuantity
inputs.description: Quantity of shares times 10 ** 18 requested to be received

abiDocs.name: isSubscriptionPermitted
abiDocs.return: Whether identity is eligible to invest in a Melon fund.
abiDocs.notice: Checks whether subscription is permitted for a participant
